options.title: Beginner
options.description: In Beginner level 10 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Intermediate
options.description: In Intermediate level 20 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Advanced
options.description: In Advanced level 30 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Under 2 hours
options.description: For duration,below 2 hours 5 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: 2 - 10 hours
options.description: For duration,2 - 10 hours 10 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: 11 - 20 hours
options.description: For duration,11 - 20 hours 15 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Above 1 week
options.description: For duration,above 1 week 20 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Free Course
options.description: For Free course type 5 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Free certification
options.description: For Free certification 10 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Paid certification
options.description: For Paid certification 15 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: Skill Augmentation
options.description: For Skill Augmentation type 10 k-points will be assigned.

options.title: New Skill
options.description: For New Skill 20 k-points will be assigned.
